Room.Name: The Holy of Holy's
Room.Description: You have stepped into a place feeling unlike any other. Your very being seems questioned. In every direction you glance, there seems to be endless stars. The floor that had been present suddenly begins wavering in an eerie fashion.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple. To the north is a door that reads 'All Power to Pope Medius.'

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Frost
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Water
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Earth
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Air
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Fire
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A waiting room
Room.Description: This room is lined with many luxurious furnishings and wall hangings. The floor is decorated in the same checkered layout that is found in other sections of the temple.

Room.Name: The Holy Chamber of Electricity
Room.Description: This room is very plain and unfurnished. The floor seems to have concentric circles drawn upon it. In the center of these circles there stands a small pyramid shaped structure that flashes with energy.

Room.Name: A candlelit hallway
Room.Description: Candles line the walls here. The artwork is exquisite depicting many scenes of dragons and mages. The hallway is silent, lacking even the most basic of sound. Every step you take fails to emit any resounding echo. Barely discernable to the north is a heavy oaken door.

Room.Name: A candlelit hallway
Room.Description: Candles line the walls here. The artwork is exquisite depicting many scenes of dragons and mages. The hallway is silent, lacking even the most basic of sound. Every step you take fails to emit any resounding echo.

Room.Name: A candlelit hallway
Room.Description: Candles line the walls here. The artwork is exquisite depicting many scenes of dragons and mages. The hallway is silent, lacking even the most basic of sound. Every step you take fails to emit any resounding echo.

Room.Name: The Temple Alter
Room.Description: This section of the sanctuary seems much like all the rest. It holds the same beautifully laid checkerboard pattern upon the floor. Here in the center of this area, you find a large golden altar. Barely discernible here you can make out the shape of a door behind the altar.

Room.Name: Northern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the east there stands a large altar, while to the south there can been seen a statue standing. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Lirthyn' inscribed at its base.

Room.Name: Northern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the east there stands a large altar, while to the south there can been seen a statue standing.

Room.Name: Northwest Corner of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Name: A small hallway
Room.Description: The passageway here is simple and humble. Unlike other areas of the Temple there are no signs of expense or extravagance.

Room.Name: A small hallway
Room.Description: The passageway here is simple and humble. Unlike other areas of the Temple there are no signs of expense or extravagance. There are doors here leading elsewhere.

Room.Name: An Acolyte's Chambers
Room.Description: The lighting in this room is considerably dimmer than the rest of the temple. There is a small cot sitting on one corner of this room. In the other there is a small area with a pillow. The walls are plain and simple with nothing adorning them.

Room.Name: An Acolyte's Chambers
Room.Description: The lighting in this room is considerably dimmer than the rest of the temple. There is a small cot sitting on one corner of this room. In the other there is a small area with a pillow. The walls are plain and simple with nothing adorning them.

The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the west there stands a large altar, while to the south there can been seen a statue standing. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Wyndstrom' inscribed at its base.

Room.Name: An Acolyte's Chambers
Room.Description: The lighting in this room is considerably dimmer than the rest of the temple. There is a small cot sitting on one corner of this room. In the other there is a small area with a pillow. The walls are plain and simple with nothing adorning them.

Room.Name: Center Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. Standing before you is a large statue. This statue stands taller than all the others in the sanctuary. Upon the base of this structure lies the name 'Pope Medius' at its base.

Room.Name: Center Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Kraken' inscribed at its base.

Room.Name: Western Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Name: Center Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Name: Eastern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the west and south there can been seen statues standing. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Shiamoor' inscribed at its base.

Room.Name: Eastern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the west and south there can been seen statues standing.

Room.Name: Southern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Name: Southern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Shiamoor' inscribed at its base. To the south is the largest iron door inside the temple.

Room.Name: Southwest Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To your west stands a simple wooden door while to your north and east stand large statues.

Room.Name: Southwest Corner of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. In the southern side, the wall is somewhat broken down to where you might be able to squeeze through.

Room.Name: Southern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. Standing before you is a large statue of a cloaked figure with the name 'Arch-Bishop Shiamoor' inscribed at its base.

Room.Name: Southern Section of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place. To the south is the exit of the Elemental Temple, while to the west stands a large statue.

Room.Name: Southeastern Corner of the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is spacious and heavily adorned. The ceilings are incredibly high, seemingly able to house even the largest of dragons. The floor is tiled in a checkerboard fashion of silver and gold. There resounds the echoes of lightly uttered sounds all about. The air carries a light scent of burned incense that is impossible to place.

Room.Name: A Blood Stained Hall
Room.Description: You find yourself caught in a moment of morbid fascination as you behold a vast hall of Polished marble. Bas-reliefs and corded stone sequences dance and frolic in splendid array around the base of both the floor and ceiling. The decorative trim is set in pictograms depicting jolly cherubs and harp wielding angels, seemingly calm and serene. As you gaze to the floor however, your stomach wretches. A thick sticky trail of old blood streaks the once proud marble floor. Splatters of blood line the once chaste pillars as pools of dried caked blood pool about their base. This room has been desecrated in ways only read about in faerie tale. Streaks of blood paint the cold marble wall, you think you see a hand print, forever caught upon it.

Room.Name: A Dark Hallway
Room.Description: Dark marble covers this room, on either side of you there are pillars that hold up this hallway. It too dark to make much of anything out, but as you walk, you hear a crunching sound, like the sound of stepped on pests.

Room.Name: A Dark Hallway
Room.Description: Dark marble covers this room, on either side of you there are pillars that hold up this hallway. It too dark to make much of anything out, but as you walk, you hear a crunching sound, like the sound of stepped on pests.

Room.Name: A Dark Hallway
Room.Description: Dark marble covers this room, on either side of you there are pillars that hold up this hallway. It too dark to make much of anything out, but as you walk, you hear a crunching sound, like the sound of stepped on pests. Through the cracks of a large wooden door, you see a faint shimmer of light.

Room.Name: A Shadowy Room
Room.Description: A stout wooden perimeter encircles this room. The center area has been dropped down about a foot and a half with a single step leading down. The lowered floor seems oddly warm to the touch. Upon close inspection you notice the wood has been worn to a fine grain, save for the occasional knick and gouge caused by weapons. A tattered war banner of a forgotten general flaps in a gentle breeze, mounted on a sturdy iron bar in the northern part of the room. While standing on the raised perimeter you get the impression that you're in an audience, the view of the center seems prominent, and functional.

Room.Name: Hallway leading to the Sanctuary
Room.Description: This room is considerably smaller than the foyer entrance next to it. The walls are plain and unadorned, drastically contrasting with the exquisite murals found elsewhere. To the north there is a large door leading to a dimly lit sanctuary. Light murmers and gutteral tones can be heard coming from beyond the door.

Room.Name: The Foyer of the Temple
Room.Description: You are in a large room leading to a large golden door to the north. As you look around you notice that barely discernible in the dankly lit foyer there is a mural etched into the ceiling with great care. The floor beneath your feet is also of the highest quality being tiled in the finest of mithril. In the center of the foyer there stands a small plaque.

ExtraDescription.Description: This Temple was Erected by Amlaruil and Deomanix

Room.Name: Path to the Elemental Temple
Room.Description: The path winds its way through dense underbrush, the lush foliage casting dappled light upon the stones beneath your feet. Towering trees rise up on either side of the trail, and the occasional chirping of exotic birds can be heard from the branches above. As you continue down the path, a sense of unease begins to settle in the pit of your stomach. The further you go, the more the forest seems to close in around you, until at last the trees give way to a clearing. In the center of the clearing stands a towering temple, its walls covered in strange, arcane symbols.

NPC.name: elite draconian soldier
NPC.description: He looks as though he has been through many years of training and servitude to the temple. His long face seems to give way to his dark eyes and hair, making his somewhat pale complexion distort the contours of his face.
NPC.longDescription: An elite draconian soldier is standing ready.

NPC.name: draconian elder
NPC.description: Standing before you appears to be the first draconian whom is bathed, the stench of blood and decay is not upon this Elder. He seems rather aged with his heavily fatigued face. Long heavy robes flow from his shoulder down to his feet.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian elder is standing here with a look of fatigue.

NPC.name: arch-bishop kraken
NPC.description: Muttering something incoherent, this massive draconian looks up at your approach. With a Derisive sneer he quickly turns with his robes flowing and starts towards you. Every fluidic motion brings him closer to you and you to believe that entering here might not have been in your best interest.
NPC.longDescription: (Covered in Dew) An Arch-Bishop is here muttering something to himself.

NPC.name: arch-bishop lirthyn
NPC.description: With an intelligent gleam in his eye, this draconian regards your with disdain. He stands the same height as any other of his race but carries himself as if he were king. With your intrusion, the gleam in his eyes quickly turns to rage as he charges towards you.
NPC.longDescription: (Crackling with Electricity) An Arch-Bishop is here with a look of disdain upon his face.

NPC.name: arch-bishop wyndstrom
NPC.description: An unusually lithe draconian stands here with his face hooded in darkness. His robes seem to flow as if touched by a light breeze, yet none can be felt. Hearing your intrusion the figure jumps to his feet and snarls in your direction.
NPC.longDescription: (Surrounded by Winds) An Arch-Bishop is standing here.

NPC.name: arch-bishop
NPC.description: A haggard looking draconian stands before you, obviously a bit perturbed with your interruption. As you scrutinize upon him you notice that his eyes immediatly began to glow a cold blue. 'You should not have come here fool,' the man states flatly.
NPC.longDescription: (Solid) An Arch-Bishop is here red with anger.

NPC.name: arch-bishop magmus
NPC.description: Before you stands a stout looking Draconian, standing of average height for his race. Upon your entrance he looks up from his gaze with a cold stare and begins mumbling about his need to reprimand the servant outside. All at once you realize that walking in here might not have been a good idea.
NPC.longDescription: (Surrounded by Flames) A stout Arch-Bishop is pacing here.

NPC.name: arch-bishop amiboshi
NPC.description: Before you stands a regal Looking Draconian, a bit larger than any that have been spoken of in the Dragon Tower. She immediately grimaces upon your intrusion and glares towards you in fury. All Her features seemingly Darken at once as she begins to chant in deep tones.
NPC.longDescription: (Covered in Frost) An Arch-Bishop is here chanting softly.

NPC.name: pope medius
NPC.description: Before you stands an awe-inspiring figure. He is obviously a draconian by heritage, but has a similar build to that of a tree trunk. At first glance you conceive that his battle prowess must be unparalleled. As you continue to study the Pope you come upon his aged eyes. These eyes seem to contain a depth and understanding that almost seem impossible, however somewhere in that depth you sense a dark foreboding chaos present that sends shivers down your spine. What is it you see in his eyes?
NPC.longDescription: An awe-inspiring figure is floating here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: draconian spy
NPC.description: Before you stands a draconian dressed in the same garb as the other acolytes in the temple. This draconian's robe hangs unusually loose and seems to be badly mid-sized. He seems completely aware of his surroundings and everything in it. He nervously turns towards you and acknowledges your entrance. Could he be hiding something?
NPC.longDescription: A mid-sized draconian is standing here in the shadows.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Sneak Hide DetectIllusion

NPC.name: draconian warrior
NPC.description: Before you stands a healthy looking form in heavy robes standing about. You cannot discern whether it is male or female but you can see that it is of the Draconian heritage. The form mumbles something incoherent in a guttural tone as you continue to study it in scrutiny. The being seems oblivious to your presence.
NPC.longDescription: A well-built draconian is standing here mumbling.

NPC.name: draconian acolyte
NPC.description: Standing before you is a young draconian chanting a prayer to himself. He is dressed in dark clothing, though is cloaked from head to toe, so his features, except his large fangs are undetected.
NPC.longDescription: A draconian acolyte is standing here.

Item.Name: heavy robe
Item.LongDescription: A heavy leather robe with an attached hood lies here.

Item.Name: pike adamantite
Item.ShortDescription: a adamantite pike inscribed with a dragon
Item.LongDescription: An adamantite polearm with dragon inscriptions lies here, collecting dust.

Item.Name: arcane robe
Item.ShortDescription: a heavy hooded robe with Arcane symbols
Item.LongDescription: An ancient robe with Arcane symbols about it is here.

Item.Name: mantle water
Item.LongDescription: Covered with sprinkles of water, a mantle piece lies here.

Item.Name: mace water
Item.ShortDescription: a mace made of shimmering water
Item.LongDescription: A shimmering mound of water formed into a mace lies here.

Item.Name: mantle electricity
Item.LongDescription: Crackling and sparkling with electricity, a mantle piece lies.

Item.Name: hammer electricity
Item.LongDescription: Loud cracks and pops come from a halo of electricity formed into a mace.

Item.Name: mantle air
Item.LongDescription: A gust of air swirls a mantle that lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: mace air
Item.ShortDescription: a mace surrounded by a swirling vortex
Item.LongDescription: A cloud of gases and swirling vortexes hum over a mace figure.

Item.Name: mantle earth
Item.LongDescription: A mound of earth is collected here to form a mantle.

Item.Name: hammer earth
Item.ShortDescription: a large hammer made of solid earth
Item.LongDescription: Solid earth and rock in the form of a hammer lies here.

Item.Name: mantle fire
Item.LongDescription: Ablazing hot mantle lies here.

Item.Name: mace flame
Item.LongDescription: A fiery mace lies here pulsating with pure energy.
Item.ExtraFlags: Hum Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: mantle ice
Item.LongDescription: An ice-cold mantle lies here.

Item.Name: mace freezing
Item.LongDescription: A freezing cold mace lies here.

Item.Name: ring draco draconian
Item.LongDescription: An evil looking ring lies here radiating with darkness.

Item.Name: mantle pope medius
Item.LongDescription: A large mantle with the inscriptions 'Pope Medius' is resting here.

Item.Name: staff pope medius
Item.LongDescription: An exotic looking staff with the inscriptions 'Pope Medius' is sitting here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: wristguard crimson spiked
Item.LongDescription: A hoop of deep crimson color with large spikes lies here.

Item.Name: katana crimson
Item.LongDescription: A crimson katana awaits to be held.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: incinerator large axe
Item.LongDescription: A deadly looking axe surrounded by heat sits here.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: dragon tooth
Item.LongDescription: a large tooth is here on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Evil AntiGood Vorpal TwoHands Shocking Poison
